address.term: public key wey dem dey use see your moni

algorithm.term: formula wey dey run di show

asic.term: Special chip wey dey mine coin fast fast

block-reward.term: moni wey dem dey give for mining block

blockchain.term: block to block record wey no fit change

blockchain-explorer.term: oga tool wey dey find crypto waka waka

bounty.term: moni wey dem dey go give if you see bug

brain-wallet.term: secret code wey you keep in your head

bridge.term: oga platform wey move your crypto between networks

byzantine-fault-tolerance.term: Network wey no fail even if some parts bad

byzantium-fork.term: Change wey happen for di network

centralized-exchange.term: company wey dey buy and sell crypto

chain-id.term: number wey tell you which network you dey

client.term: software wey you dey use to connect to di network and wey dey confam transactions

cold-storage.term: storage wey no dey connected to internet

cold-wallet.term: wallet wey no dey connected to internet

confirmation.term: confirm say transaction don happen true true

consensus.term: agreement wey everybody for di network get

consensus-client.term: software wey dey help network reach agreement

consensus-layer.term: machine wey dey make sure everybody agree

consensus-mechanism.term: rule for how di network reach agreement

constantinople-fork.term: Change wey happen for di Ethereum network

contract.term: agreement wey dey live for di blockchain

cryptography.term: oga code wey dey keep things safe

ddos.term: Many bad people wey try to block access to something online

decentralization.term: no one person dey control am

decentralized-application.term: app wey dey run on di blockchain, no central control

decentralized-exchange.term: place to buy and sell crypto without wahala

decentralized-finance.term: crypto finance wey nor need bank

decentralized-web.term: internet wey no central control, everything dey open and free

dev.term: person wey dey build di software

developer.term: person wey dey build di software

difficulty.term: how hard e be to mine new coins

difficulty-bomb.term: something wey dey make mining harder and harder over time

digital-asset.term: oga digital property wey you fit buy and sell

digital-signature.term: oga code wey prove say na you sign something

distributed-ledger-technology.term: Technology wey dey use create distributed ledgers

ecosystem.term: community wey support each other for crypto

encryption.term: locking your data so only you fit open am

epoch.term: one period of time in di blockchain

ether.term: native coin of di Ethereum network

ethereum-improvement-proposal.term: Suggestion for changing di Ethereum network

ethereum-virtual-machine.term: Machine wey dey make Ethereum work

exchange.term: platform wey you fit buy and sell crypto

execution-client.term: software wey dey run transaction for Ethereum blockchain

execution-layer.term: part of di network wey dey handle di execution clients

faucet.term: app wey dey give small amount of free crypto for new users

fault-tolerant.term: system wey fit still work even if e get fault

finality-rate.term: speed wey dem dey use confirmin transaction wey no fit change

financial-technology.term: technology wey change how people manage money

firewall.term: barrier wey protect your computer from bad things

fork.term: split in di network, two versions now

fractional-ownership.term: you get small part of one big thing

fraud-proof.term: dem get way to catch bad belle for some crypto

full-node.term: computer wey e download and keep the whole blockchain

gas-fee.term: moni wey you go pay make your crypto take waka

gas-price.term: moni wey you go make your transaction waka sharp-sharp

governance.term: how dem dey decide for blockchain matter

halving.term: halve block reward every now and then

hard-fork.term: major change for di blockchain rule

hd-wallet.term: wallet wey generate addresses from a single seed phrase

hex-data.term: number system wey use 16 symbols instead of 10

hot-storage.term: Software storage wey dey connected to di internet

hybrid-network.term: network wey join different-different tech together

hyperledger.term: Free software wey you fit use build blockchain

ibc.term: System wey blockchains fit use to tok to each other

internal-transaction.term: movement of crypto inside di network

interoperability.term: different crypto networks fit wok together

ipo.term: When company first dey sell shares to public

json-file.term: Special file format wey computers fit use share data JSON

liquidity.term: how easy it be to buy and sell crypto, like how fast you fit change am to cash

liquidity-staking.term: stake moni for tradin moni pot

mev.term: Highest Value wey Person Fit Get for Trade

modular-blockchain.term: blockchain wey dem break into pieces

nft-aggregator.term: one big marketplace for all your digital art

non-fungible-token.term: unique digital asset wey no get copy

off-ramp.term: way to buy and sell crypto

ommer-block.term: block wey get created temporarily but no dey included in the main chain

on-ramp.term: way to buy and sell crypto

optimistic-rollup.term: e go check well-well if fraud dey

permissioned-ledger.term: blockchain wey only certain people get access to

phishing.term: fake website or email wey wan steal your crypto

pki.term: System wey manage public keys and certificates for security

poa.term: How dem dey protect blockchain by using people wey we trust

private-blockchain.term: blockchain wey only certain people get access to

private-currency.term: digital money wey e no be public

proof-of-stake.term: How dem dey protect blockchain by you holding crypto

proof-of-work.term: How dem dey protect blockchain by computer wey dey solve hard problems

quorum.term: Number wey dey needed for agreement

relayer.term: Connector wey Make Blockchain Transactions Happen

scaling.term: make am fit carry more work

security-token.term: Special tokens wey you fit invest

security-token-offering.term: Dem dey sell special tokens for investment

self-custody.term: you dey hol your crypto keys yourself

serialization.term: turn data small for storage or to send

shard-chain.term: small chains wey dey work with big chain

sidechain.term: separate blockchain wey dey connect to main one

slashing-condition.term: wetin fit make dem destroy validator money

slippage.term: price change before you finish to buy/sell

smart-contract.term: agreement wey dey run by itself

soft-fork.term: small upgrade or change wey no break old systems

stablecoin.term: crypto wey hin value no dey change too much

stake.term: make you hold crypto so you go fit collect gain

state.term: wetin dey happen now for blockchain network

state-channels.term: special channels wey dey make transaction happen quick-quick for Ethereum

swap.term: make u trade crypto for anoda

testnet.term: where dem dey test new software

transaction.term: moving your crypto around like you dey move money

transaction-fee.term: money wey you dey pay for transaction

turing-complete.term: a computer wey fit do anything

tvl.term: Total value of crypto wey dey locked up

unspent-transaction-output.term: small pieces of money wey you fit use again

validator.term: person wey dey check if transaction correct

validity-proof.term: proof wey show say transaction correct

vesting.term: to hold your token for some time before you sell

wallet.term: place wey you dey keep your crypto

webhook.term: automatic message wey dey connect apps

whitepaper.term: document wey explain new crypto project

wrapping.term: converting one crypto to anoda format

xpub.term: Special kind of key wey fit generate plenty addresses for your crypto wallet
